description.en-US: Metric Unit Converter & Search lets you accurately convert different units of measurement in one place. Whether you want to convert Fahrenheit to Celsius, kilometers to miles, liters to ounces or any other popular unit of conversion, this tool simplifies the process and provides instant results. You can also add notes for easy reference so you never forget important details. How it works To use the metric converter: - Click Metric Unit Converter & Search on your toolbar to open a new tab - Select a category for unit conversion (eg. Length) - Enter a value into an input box (eg. ‘5’ in the mile input box) - Get precise conversion results across multiple metric units - Click ‘Notes’ to record important information To use web search: This extension makes Microsoft Bing your default search provider. Enjoy unlimited browsing, stream videos, shop online, and find answers to all your queries. Want to share feedback? Please fill out this form and help us improve the product for you: https://metricunitconverter.com/public/contactus_ff.html You can uninstall this product at any time. Please follow the instructions here: https://metricunitconverter.com/public/uninstall_ff.html By clicking the button above, I consent to install this extension and abide by its Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Microsoft Bing is a trademark of Microsoft Inc. Use of it here does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by Microsoft Inc. Metric Unit Converter & Search is a product offered by Atom Apps LLC. Here is a summary of the user data that our add-on collects and how we process it: IP address: Your IP address is collected when you use this add-on, but we ensure that it is anonymized and not linked to your identity. This information is used solely for analytics, reporting purposes, and to provide the functionalities of the add-on. You have the option to opt-out of sharing this information with us, but please note that it may limit your access to certain features. Technical data: The add-on collects technical information, such as domain name and user agent, to aid in product upgrades and assist in fraud detection. This data is not personally identifiable and is utilized for optimization purposes. It cannot be used to identify individual users. Information explicitly shared by users: When using this add-on, we collect and process the files and inputs provided by you to generate relevant results. Additionally, if you choose to provide us with information such as your name, telephone number, or email address through feedback forms, crash reports, enhancement suggestions, or other forms of communication, we may collect and process that information. This data is solely used to address user queries, concerns, and will not be shared with any third parties. Please review our full Privacy Policy for more detailed information on how we handle and safeguard your data. Privacy Policy: https://metricunitconverter.com/public/privacypolicy_ff.html Terms of Service: https://metricunitconverter.com/public/termsofservice_ff.html

summary.en-US: Metric Unit Converter & Search provides an easy-to-use metric conversion tool via the favicon on the toolbar along with web search results by Microsoft Bing.
